1.3.5.10 Dhammakathikapucchasutta
Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta
Tatiyapaṇṇāsaka
Navapurāṇavagga
Dhammakathikapucchasutta
155.
852Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami…pe…  ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—  “‘dhammakathiko, dhammakathiko’ti, bhante, vuccati. Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotī”ti?
853“Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya. Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, ‘dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya. Cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti, ‘diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya…pe…  jivhāya ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya…pe…  manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya. Manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, ‘dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya. Manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti, ‘diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāyā”ti.
854Dasamaṃ.
855Navapurāṇavaggo pañcamo.
856Tassuddānaṃ
857
Kammaṃ cattāri sappāyā,
anantevāsi kimatthiyā;
Atthi nu kho pariyāyo,
indriyakathikena cāti.
858Saḷāyatanavagge tatiyapaṇṇāsako samatto.
859Tassa vagguddānaṃ
860
Yogakkhemi ca loko ca,
Gahapati devadahena ca;
Navapurāṇena paṇṇāso,
Tatiyo tena vuccatīti.
